ygData.subject: Re: Wedding details
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I thought about OOT, since Kelethin, the place I really wanted to hold it, is like, spam city... but unlike Luna, who IS a Sister of Erolissi *grins*, I
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I thought about OOT, since Kelethin, the place I really wanted to hold it, is
like, spam city... but unlike Luna, who IS a Sister of Erolissi *grins*, I don't really
have an RP reason. I found a really pretty glade in Lesser Faydark, but again there's
some ooc and shout traffic. The Arena in Lake Rathe is a really good spot! I think
you'll have a beautiful wedding, Wendy.

You see, we've been betrothed since June. We had certain things we wanted to
accomplish, and we're almost there, but it's been a long wait. So I want everything to
be beautiful and perfect and all that good stuff. =) When I was playing UO, it was
different... you could have a wedding dress, and bridesmaid's colors, and colored armor
for the guys, and we even had a red carpet in our castle, hehe. Flowers and food and
wine set out and alla that good stuff. I don't know how to make it special here.
*sighs*

Suzanne
Sara/Aelwesara, Povar

Christina Norman wrote:

> From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
>
> The wedding was awesome! We had a wonderful ceremony by Imaryn the head
> guide of the server. After the ceremony we had a celebration with
> friends. I hired a caterer who served us some exotic treats, and the wine
> flowed freely.
>
> I think the big ingredient in a fun wedding is having the ceremony
> performed by someone who is friendly and can do it well, and a bunch of
> alcohol and food. Not too deep but that's it ;) Location is the most
> important thing to think of. I chose ocean of tears so we wouldn't be
> spammed by lots of OOC talk (and the sisters isle was just so perfect for
> Luna).
> - Tina
